name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with over 13 years of experience specializing in AI, machine learning, and cloud architectures. Proficient in **Python**, with advanced skills in **C++**, **PyTorch**, and **ONNX** for building and deploying neural networks and high-performance computing solutions. Experienced in data processing frameworks and leveraging **cloud-native** systems to optimize performance tuning and automation.

Demonstrated ability to develop and implement machine learning models, ensuring effective problem-solving and collaboration across cross-functional teams. Strong focus on integrity and autonomy in delivering compliant solutions that meet industry standards. Proven success in creating AI/ML-powered applications with predictive analytics and real-time processing capabilities.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and deployed AI solutions leveraging **Python**, **C++**, **PyTorch**, and **ONNX** to enhance performance tuning and high-performance computing capabilities in existing systems.
- Designed machine learning models that utilize **neural networks** for advanced data processing, resulting in a **20% improvement** in predictive accuracy compared to previous implementations.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate cloud architectures, ensuring scalability and reliability across **AWS** and **Azure** environments.
- Conducted rigorous performance tuning and optimization efforts that led to a **30% reduction** in computation times for data processing frameworks.
- Implemented autonomous systems leveraging AI to enhance data processing workflows while maintaining a focus on integrity and compliance with industry standards.
- Optimized algorithms for real-time decision-making in complex environments, applying problem-solving skills to tackle unique challenges in machine learning.
- Fostered collaboration within teams to develop cutting-edge AI features resulting in substantially improved accuracy in real-time applications.
- Enhanced existing workflows by integrating state-of-the-art models into operational systems, thereby increasing efficiency in data-driven decision-making processes.

• Developed and implemented **machine learning** models for fraud detection using **Python**, **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enhancing transaction security and generating proactive alerts for suspicious activities.
• Designed and built robust **cloud architectures** utilizing **Azure** and **Kafka** for real-time data processing and event-driven workflows, improving system reliability by **30%**.
• Leveraged **data processing frameworks** and ETL pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** for ingesting and processing financial data, achieving a throughput of **1,000 transactions per minute** in batch and real-time scenarios.
• Optimized performance tuning for **neural networks** and machine learning algorithms, resulting in a **15%** increase in model accuracy and reducing inference time by **25%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of **AI** solutions with existing financial platforms, fostering a culture of **collaboration** and **integrity** in all projects.
• Utilized **C++** to enhance the performance of critical components in AI workflows, ensuring high-performance computing capabilities and responsiveness at scale.
• Conducted extensive problem-solving sessions to address and troubleshoot system bottlenecks, improving overall system efficiency by **20%** while maintaining autonomy in project delivery.

Utilized **Python** to develop AI-driven backend services, enhancing performance in machine learning tasks and supporting high-performance computing capabilities for real-time data processing.
Engineered neural network models using **PyTorch** and **ONNX**, applying advanced algorithms to optimize data processing frameworks, resulting in a **25%** increase in model accuracy and efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve complex AI/ML challenges, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and a commitment to integrity and excellence.
Designed scalable cloud architectures that improved processing speeds by **30%**, implementing strategies for disaster recovery and data redundancy.
Conducted performance tuning for AI applications, enhancing execution speeds and responsiveness, which significantly reduced time-to-insight for critical data analysis tasks.
Applied advanced machine learning techniques in real-time applications, producing solutions that handled **1M+** data points efficiently and effectively.
Actively participated in peer code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions, promoting a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement within the team.
Maintained autonomy while driving projects forward, ensuring timely delivery while adhering to project specifications and quality standards.
